structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: When the classification and ratio between classes on any specific plan, has been finally determined, the commission may carry out the plan itself, or contract for construction of said sewers and/or drains included in the plan by the metropolitan sewer district or otherwise.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 14, effective June 19, 1952.
